title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog
description: When searching via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are returned.
OB: When searching for declarations, no results are displayed when searching via the Package view selection and dialog. However, searching via the context menu in the Packages view works.
EB: When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, the expected behavior is to display the search results correctly.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Packages view. 
2. Select a package. 
3. Right-click on the package and choose the 'Search' option from the context menu. 
4. In the search dialog that appears, enter a declaration to search for. 
5. Observe that no search results are displayed.
